name: SnoLab Trial: 2200 AD
description:
SnoLab Trial: 2200 AD is a difficult platformer set in an abandoned underground laboratory. Throughout the game's four levels, players will activate computers, which open doors, activate turrets, and even open vents that release hostile rats on the player. The game ends with an intense wall-jumping race with a boss to the top of a cavern.

It was created in a 48-hour game jam by three programmers and an artist/musician. No further development is planned on this game. There are some bugs.
